In England, in the seven days to 26 March, there were 30,919 new confirmed cases (54.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 19 March, there were 31,496 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 2% (577 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 31 March is 3,800,722 (6,752.4 cases per 100,000 population).
